SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Class Check

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.Check
public class Check extends Object
The Check class provides a set of static methods used by the client application for various checks and validations. These methods are designed to be used by both the GUI and CLI.

  • Method Details

    • createItemTileView

      public static ItemTileView[] createItemTileView(ArrayList<Integer> coordinates, BoardBoxView[][] boardBoxViews)
      Creates an array of ItemTileView objects based on the given coordinates and board box views.
      Parameters:
      coordinates - the list of coordinates representing the positions on the board
      boardBoxViews - the 2D array of board box views representing the board
      Returns:
      an array of ItemTileView objects created from the given coordinates and board box views

    • insertTiles

      public static ItemTileView[][] insertTiles(int columnSelected, ItemTileView[][] bookshelf, ItemTileView[] selectedItemTiles)
      Inserts the selected item tiles into the specified column of the bookshelf.
      Parameters:
      columnSelected - the index of the column where the tiles should be inserted
      bookshelf - the 2D array representing the bookshelf
      selectedItemTiles - the array of selected item tiles to be inserted
      Returns:
      the updated bookshelf with the tiles inserted

    • permuteSelection

      public static ItemTileView[] permuteSelection(ItemTileView[] tilesSelected, int[] orderSelected)
      Permutes the order of the selected item tiles based on the specified order.
      Parameters:
      tilesSelected - the array of selected item tiles
      orderSelected - the array representing the desired order of the tiles
      Returns:
      the array of selected item tiles with the permuted order

    • allAdjacent

      public static boolean allAdjacent(ArrayList<Integer> coordinatesSelected)
      Checks if all the coordinates in the list are adjacent to each other.
      Parameters:
      coordinatesSelected - the list of selected coordinates
      Returns:
      true if all coordinates are adjacent, false otherwise

    • allSameRowOrSameColumn

      public static boolean allSameRowOrSameColumn(ArrayList<Integer> coordinatesSelected)
      Checks if all the coordinates in the list are in the same row or same column.
      Parameters:
      coordinatesSelected - the list of selected coordinates
      Returns:
      true if all coordinates are in the same row or same column, false otherwise

    • checkCoordinates

      public static ErrorType checkCoordinates(int x, int y, BoardBoxView[][] board)
      Checks if the given coordinates are valid on the board.
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate
      y - the y-coordinate
      board - the 2D array representing the board
      Returns:
      an ErrorType if the coordinates are invalid, null otherwise

    • checkSelectable

      public static ErrorType checkSelectable(ArrayList<Integer> selection, BoardBoxView[][] board)
      Checks if the selected coordinates on the board are valid for selection.
      Parameters:
      selection - the list of selected coordinates
      board - the 2D array representing the board
      Returns:
      an ErrorType if the selection is invalid, null otherwise

    • checkNumTilesSelectedBoard

      public static ErrorType checkNumTilesSelectedBoard(ArrayList<Integer> coordinatesSelected, ItemTileView[][] bookshelf)
      Checks the number of selected tiles on the board against the maximum number of selectable tiles.
      Parameters:
      coordinatesSelected - the list of selected coordinates
      bookshelf - the 2D array representing the bookshelf
      Returns:
      an ErrorType if there are too many tiles selected, null otherwise

    • resetChoiceBoard

      public static ErrorType resetChoiceBoard(int lastOrAll, ArrayList<Integer> coordinatesSelected)
      Resets the selected coordinates on the board based on the lastOrAll parameter.
      Parameters:
      lastOrAll - the flag indicating whether to reset the last selection or all selections 0: reset the last selection 1: reset all selections
      coordinatesSelected - the list of selected coordinates
      Returns:
      an ErrorType if there are no coordinates selected, null otherwise

    • checkBookshelf

      public static ErrorType checkBookshelf(int column, ItemTileView[][] bookshelfView, ItemTileView[] tilesSelected)
      Checks if the selected tiles can be placed in the specified column of the bookshelf.
      Parameters:
      column - the column index to check
      bookshelfView - the 2D array representing the bookshelf view
      tilesSelected - the array of selected tiles
      Returns:
      an ErrorType if the column is invalid or there are not enough free cells in the column, null otherwise

    • numSelectableTiles

      public static int numSelectableTiles(ItemTileView[][] bookshelfView)
      Calculates the maximum number of selectable tiles from the bookshelf.
      Parameters:
      bookshelfView - the 2D array representing the bookshelf view
      Returns:
      the number of selectable tiles, capped at a maximum value

    • computeFreeShelves

      public static int[] computeFreeShelves(ItemTileView[][] bookshelfView)
      Computes the number of free shelves in each column of the bookshelf.
      Parameters:
      bookshelfView - the 2D array representing the bookshelf view
      Returns:
      an array containing the number of free shelves in each column

    • maxFreeShelves

      public static int maxFreeShelves(int[] freeShelves)
      Finds the maximum number of free shelves among the given array of shelves.
      Parameters:
      freeShelves - an array representing the number of free shelves in each column
      Returns:
      the maximum number of free shelves

    • checkPermuteSelection

      public static ErrorType checkPermuteSelection(int[] order, ItemTileView[] itemTileViews)
      Checks if the given order of indices is valid for permuting the item tile views.
      Parameters:
      order - an array representing the order of indices
      itemTileViews - an array of item tile views
      Returns:
      an ErrorType indicating any errors, or null if the order is valid
